content.description: The description in lines 62-68 (“When he spoke
content.question: . . . voice”) suggests that Lincoln

choices.label: tailored the delivery of his stories as well as the stories themselves to emphasize the message he was trying to convey
used mixed metaphors to support each point he was trying to make
dramatized the lives of real people to emphasize the significance of their actions
drew examples from current events as well as history to exploit his audience’s anxieties

content.answer: tailored the delivery of his stories as well as the stories themselves to emphasize the message he was trying to convey

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
